speaker: ANDREW
text: No, faith, I’ll not stay a jot longer.

speaker: TOBY
text: Thy reason, dear venom, give thy reason.

speaker: FABIAN
text: You must needs yield your reason, Sir Andrew.

speaker: ANDREW
text: Marry, I saw your niece do more favors to the

speaker: ANDREW
text: Count’s servingman than ever she bestowed upon

speaker: ANDREW
text: me. I saw ’t i’ th’ orchard.

speaker: TOBY
text: Did she see thee the while, old boy? Tell me

speaker: TOBY
text: that.

speaker: ANDREW
text: As plain as I see you now.

speaker: FABIAN
text: This was a great argument of love in her toward

speaker: FABIAN
text: you.

speaker: ANDREW
text: ’Slight, will you make an ass o’ me?

speaker: FABIAN
text: I will prove it legitimate, sir, upon the oaths of

speaker: FABIAN
text: judgment and reason.

speaker: TOBY
text: And they have been grand-jurymen since before

speaker: TOBY
text: Noah was a sailor.

speaker: FABIAN
text: She did show favor to the youth in your sight

speaker: FABIAN
text: only to exasperate you, to awake your dormouse

speaker: FABIAN
text: valor, to put fire in your heart and brimstone in

speaker: FABIAN
text: your liver. You should then have accosted her, and

speaker: FABIAN
text: with some excellent jests, fire-new from the mint,

speaker: FABIAN
text: you should have banged the youth into dumbness.

speaker: FABIAN
text: This was looked for at your hand, and this was

speaker: FABIAN
text: balked. The double gilt of this opportunity you let

speaker: FABIAN
text: time wash off, and you are now sailed into the north

speaker: FABIAN
text: of my lady’s opinion, where you will hang like an

speaker: FABIAN
text: icicle on a Dutchman’s beard, unless you do redeem

speaker: FABIAN
text: it by some laudable attempt either of valor or

speaker: FABIAN
text: policy.

speaker: ANDREW
text: An ’t be any way, it must be with valor, for

speaker: ANDREW
text: policy I hate. I had as lief be a Brownist as a

speaker: ANDREW
text: politician.

speaker: TOBY
text: Why, then, build me thy fortunes upon the basis

speaker: TOBY
text: of valor. Challenge me the Count’s youth to fight

speaker: TOBY
text: with him. Hurt him in eleven places. My niece shall

speaker: TOBY
text: take note of it, and assure thyself there is no

speaker: TOBY
text: love-broker in the world can more prevail in man’s

speaker: TOBY
text: commendation with woman than report of valor.

speaker: FABIAN
text: There is no way but this, Sir Andrew.

speaker: ANDREW
text: Will either of you bear me a challenge to him?

speaker: TOBY
text: Go, write it in a martial hand. Be curst and

speaker: TOBY
text: brief. It is no matter how witty, so it be eloquent

speaker: TOBY
text: and full of invention. Taunt him with the license of

speaker: TOBY
text: ink. If thou “thou”-est him some thrice, it shall not

speaker: TOBY
text: be amiss, and as many lies as will lie in thy sheet of

speaker: TOBY
text: paper, although the sheet were big enough for the

speaker: TOBY
text: bed of Ware in England, set ’em down. Go, about it.

speaker: TOBY
text: Let there be gall enough in thy ink, though thou

speaker: TOBY
text: write with a goose-pen, no matter. About it.

speaker: ANDREW
text: Where shall I find you?

speaker: TOBY
text: We’ll call thee at the cubiculo. Go.

speaker: FABIAN
text: This is a dear manikin to you, Sir Toby.

speaker: TOBY
text: I have been dear to him, lad, some two thousand

speaker: TOBY
text: strong or so.

speaker: FABIAN
text: We shall have a rare letter from him. But you’ll

speaker: FABIAN
text: not deliver ’t?

speaker: TOBY
text: Never trust me, then. And by all means stir on

speaker: TOBY
text: the youth to an answer. I think oxen and wainropes

speaker: TOBY
text: cannot hale them together. For Andrew, if he were

speaker: TOBY
text: opened and you find so much blood in his liver as

speaker: TOBY
text: will clog the foot of a flea, I’ll eat the rest of th’

speaker: TOBY
text: anatomy.

speaker: FABIAN
text: And his opposite, the youth, bears in his visage

speaker: FABIAN
text: no great presage of cruelty.

speaker: TOBY
text: Look where the youngest wren of mine comes.

speaker: MARIA
text: If you desire the spleen, and will laugh yourselves

speaker: MARIA
text: into stitches, follow me. Yond gull Malvolio is

speaker: MARIA
text: turned heathen, a very renegado; for there is no

speaker: MARIA
text: Christian that means to be saved by believing rightly

speaker: MARIA
text: can ever believe such impossible passages of grossness.

speaker: MARIA
text: He’s in yellow stockings.

speaker: TOBY
text: And cross-gartered?

speaker: MARIA
text: Most villainously, like a pedant that keeps a

speaker: MARIA
text: school i’ th’ church. I have dogged him like his

speaker: MARIA
text: murderer. He does obey every point of the letter

speaker: MARIA
text: that I dropped to betray him. He does smile his face

speaker: MARIA
text: into more lines than is in the new map with the

speaker: MARIA
text: augmentation of the Indies. You have not seen such

speaker: MARIA
text: a thing as ’tis. I can hardly forbear hurling things at

speaker: MARIA
text: him. I know my lady will strike him. If she do, he’ll

speaker: MARIA
text: smile and take ’t for a great favor.

speaker: TOBY
text: Come, bring us, bring us where he is.
